TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_huzil, title = huzil, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/huzil} }

S.FORM: huzil(ke' na Plmukan: 狗)ru hoyin ga, qsinu ru tpngan na squliq. huzil ga, baq balay qbuyang qsinu. Huzil ga baq mlahang ngasal.
hozil(ke' na Plmokan: 狗)ro hoyin ga, qsino ro tpngan na sqoliq. hozil ga, baq balay qboyang qsino. Hozil ga baq mlahang ngasal.
